gw.plugin.document.impl

Class StandardDocumentTemplateSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.plugin.document.impl.StandardDocumentTemplateSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, IDocumentTemplateSerializer, java.rmi.Remote

    public class StandardDocumentTemplateSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDocumentTemplateSerializer
    The basic implementation of IDocumentTemplateSerializer which converts to and from a basic XML representation.
